entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 March 2023
